svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2021-05-10T17:41:34.181Z" agent="5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 11_3_1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/14.5.1 Chrome/89.0.4389.82 Electron/12.0.1 Safari/537.36" version="14.5.1" etag="F0rGSlF7vJ4WNcMmVq-K" type="device"><diagram id="txWCQaNbu0HlG4r7cLSX"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 243px; height: 1px; padding-top: 54px; margin-left: 342px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

b.font: Volatile data structures remain in DRAM.

switch.text: Volatile data structures remain in DRAM.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 282px; height: 1px; padding-top: 114px; margin-left: 344px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 104px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

font.b: Column Store Main moves to Persistent Memory

p.font: - More than 95% of data in most HANA Systems.

- Loading of tables into memory at startup becomes
obsolete

switch.text: Column Store Main moves to Persistent Memory...
